author: nurfikri89
body:
Backport from #30674 

**PR description:**

This PR adds major updates to scripts needed for Custom JME NanoAODs production. The major changes are:

1. AK4 CHS jets, AK4 Puppi jets and AK4 Gen jets are reclustered from MiniAODs and are used to replace slimmedJets, slimmedJetsPuppi and slimmedGenJets. The rationale behind this is to store very low pt jets (as low as 2 GeV) needed for jet energy scale and resolution studies by JERC group.

2. AK4 Puppi jets have almost the same set of variables stored as AK4 CHS jets. To be used for performance comparison studies between AK4 CHS jets and AK4 Puppi jets.

3. Add PF jet multiplicity variables for different PF candidate types.


**if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:**

Original PR is #30674 

**NOTE**: Requires NanoAODv7 to be backported (#31063) and then an earlier backport (#29290) to be merged first before this PR can be merged.
title: Backport of #30674 (Major updates for Custom JME NanoAODs) to 10_6_X
